website.description: (REQUIRED) The address of the login page

is_last_month.description: set to true if you fill hours for last month

presence.description: type of presence, requires the value on Hilan source code. HINT(presence=0, w.home=

project_code.description: The name of the project to fill

start_time_distribution.description: List of probabilities (earlier and later than 'start_time', steps of .5h)

hours_distribution.description: List of probabilities (later than min_hours, steps of .5h)
